blog.name: ao3feed-clintxnat
blog.title: love is for children, i owe him a debt.
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of all fic posted on the Archive Of Our Own under the Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov pairing tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed using an IFTTT recipe, but this was made easy thanks to astolat (astolat.tumblr.com). If you would like to set up a similar blog, see the instructions tab :) To check announcements regarding these blogs, go to the tumblr tag #ao3feed announcement. (moderated by enjolbutt.tumblr.com) I hope this blog helps when you are in dire need of feels or a laugh, so enjoy! :)

title: DRABBLES!
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2BS5BS0

by Agent_Burkhart

Words: 659, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Gravity Falls, Doctor Who, NCIS, Sherlock (TV)
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/F, F/M, M/M, Multi, Other
  • Characters: James “Bucky” Barnes, Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Pepper Potts, Clint Barton, Thor (Marvel), Loki (Marvel), Pietro Maximoff, Wanda Maximoff, Vision (Marvel), Friday (Marvel), Dipper Pines, Mabel Pines, Stan Pines, Bill Cipher, Sherlock Holmes, The Doctor (Doctor Who), River Song, Amy Pond (Doctor Who), Rory Williams, Hela (Marvel), Original Female Character(s)
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers, Steve Rogers/Tony Stark, Steve Rogers/Natasha Romanov, James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers/Tony Stark/Original Character(s), Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov, James “Bucky” Barnes/Tony Stark, James “Bucky” Barnes/Original Female Character(s), Steve Rogers/Original Female Character(s), Loki (Marvel)/Original Female Character(s), Tony Stark/Original Female Character(s), Pietro Maximoff/Original Female Character(s), Wanda Maximoff/Vision, Natasha Romanov/Original Female Character(s), Dipper Pines & Mabel Pines, Bill Cipher/Original Female Character(s), Sherlock Holmes/Original Female Character(s), The Doctor (Doctor Who) & Original Female Character(s), Amy Pond/Rory Williams, The Doctor/River Song/Original Female Character(s), Hela (Marvel)/Original Female Character(s)
  • Additional Tags: LBGTQ, Gay, These will be drabbles, I am listing characters that I know that I will mostly write about, I will probably write a bit of smut, and probably heavily gay smut, Protective Steve Rogers, Not Canon Compliant, For All Of it, EXCEPT IF I HAVE TO STAY PUT WITH A SCENE!, Post-Serum Steve Rogers, Bisexual Steve Rogers, Alpha/Beta/Omega Dynamics, Alpha Steve Rogers, Alpha Bucky Barnes, Beta Tony Stark, Alpha Natasha Romanov, Beta Pepper Potts, Omega Wanda Maximoff, Beta Vision, alpha pietro maximoff, YOU ALL GET MY GIST NOW! I TOTALLY KNOW MY FIRST CHAPTER, I hope to get over a thousand words with one chapter.

summary: Day 2 of 365 Days of Writing Prompts
title: Day 2 of 365 Days of Writing Prompts
body:
Avengers x Reader

Summary – Day 2 of 365 Days of Writing Prompts: Your character in yesterday’s post is justified (…at least to some extent), make us trust their goal is positive

Warnings –…probably a curse word or two

Word Count – 1K

Notes: If anyone is interested in joining me, here’s the link: 365 Days of Writing Prompts

Series Masterlist

Masterlist

Day 1

“So, are we going to talk about what happened last night?” Tony asked as Bruce stumbled into the lab.

Bruce squinted at the time on one of the computer monitors. “It’s barely past noon, Tony. Do we really have to do this now?”

Tony stood and walked over to his friend and laid a hand on his shoulder. “C'mon, Banner. It’s me.”

“Yeah, that’s the part that’s confusing me the most,” Bruce admitted with a grimace. “Since when did you becoming the deep-emotion guy? I thought that was Steve’s thing?”

Tony hemmed and hawed for a moment before finally confessing. “Pepper is concerned that I’m bottling up all of my emotions. Our therapist…”

“Your therapist?” Bruce interrupted. “Since when did you start seeing a therapist?”

“Right about the time Pepper found out he almost died on his little field trip to Titan,” YN interjected as she peeked out from behind her work station.

Bruce forced a smile onto his face and carefully nodded his aching head. “Hey, YN, didn’t see you there.” He turned back to Tony. “I think it’s great you’re talking to someone…”

“Yeah, I bet you are,” Tony teased with a wink.

“I told you—I’m not that kind of doctor,” Bruce reminded him.

“I know, I know.” Tony brushed aside his concerns. “The point I’m trying to make is that I’m worried about you. What you said last night…”

“If you had let me explain…"Bruce interrupted.

Tony continued speaking as though Bruce hadn’t said a word. ”…doesn’t make any sense, buddy. You were stuck as the Hulk for over two years.“

"Tell me about it,” Bruce lamented as he thought about the two years of his life that had been lost while the Hulk had been living it up as the Grandmaster’s pet.

Bruce shook his head and tried to focus his train of thought through the haze of the worst hangover he’d ever experienced. “Anyway, I think I’ve been going about this all wrong, Tony.”

“Let him speak,” YN warned Tony when she saw him gearing up to hit his soap box again.

Tony shut his mouth with a frustrated sigh and motioned for Bruce to explain his reasoning.

“We good?” Bruce asked. “You’re not going to keep interrupting me to tell me how stupid you think my idea is?”

“Tony’s going to behave,” YN assured Bruce as she gave Tony a hard look. “Aren’t you, Tony?”

“Who invited you again?” Tony asked YN with his usual sarcastic wit.

YN gave him a wink. “Don’t forget who helped you make it back to Earth.”

“Touché,” Tony admitted before turning back to Bruce. “By all means, please enlighten me as to the reason why you think the Hulk needs to come out and play more often.”

Bruce pursed his lips and tried to find the best way to put his thoughts into words. “You remember what happened at the Sanctum right after I got back. I was completely useless in the fight against Thanos because the Hulk wouldn’t appear when I called him.”

“Okay, so you’re saying he needs to be better trained?” Tony asked with a confused look.

“That’s the opposite of what I’m trying to say.” Bruce paused and ran a hand down his haggard face. “We’ve been treating the Hulk like some kind of toy—or weapon—I don’t know. The point is, Hulk has his own consciousness that even I wasn’t fully aware of. He’s not the most civilized being on the planet, but he’s got feelings just everyone else.”

“I think I see where you’re going with this,” Tony said as the pieces started falling into place. “You want the Hulk to feel like he has…uh, a what?…a life?”

Bruce shrugged his shoulders. “If that’s what it takes to make sure he’ll be available when we need him, then yeah.”

YN’s brow furrowed as she tried to understand what Bruce was saying. “So, you don’t think that the Hulk is an extension of your own psyche?”

“No, not exactly,” Bruce confirmed. “I think we’re linked, but he has his own personality separate from mine.”

“And you think we all need to get to know him—to be friends with him?” Tony asked as he arched one brow in question.

“Something like that. It’ll be good for you all to train with him so you’ll be better prepared for the next big bad that comes knocking on our door.”

“I think it’s a great idea,” YN said, earning her two shocked glances from the geniuses. “Not that my opinion matters at all.”

“Dammit, Banner,” Tony exclaimed as he grimaced and shook his head. “That’s twice this year that you’ve forced me to agree with the two biggest idiots in this Tower.”

“Hey now,” YN said, immediately taking offense. “I may not be a genius, but at least I’m not an airhead like Pietro.”

“I apologize, YN,” Tony said as he conceded YN’s point. “I keep forgetting we brought him back with the rest of the idiots that got zapped by the snap.”

“Ignore Tony,” Bruce told her with a smile. “I think you’ve done a fabulous job.”

“Well at least someone appreciates how much I do around here,” she mumbled under her breath as she turned back to her work.

“So, you’ll help me with the Hulk?”

Tony rolled his eyes. “If that’s what you really want to do, then I’ll help.”

Bruce’s face split into a wide grin. “It’s really good to have you back.”

“Science bros?” Tony asked as he held out his fist.

Bruce gave Tony a fist bump. “Science bros.”

_______________

Thank you for reading Day 2 of my writing challenge! I hope you enjoyed it! What did you think of Bruce’s explanation for his New Years resolution? I, for one, adored all of the Hulk’s scenes in Ragnarok and I’d love to see more of him and Thor together! I look forward to your comments!

If you liked this story, please consider reblogging, and if you have any questions, my inbox is always open! 

Day 3  (Tony Stark x Reader)

Day 1

“So, are we going to talk about what happened last night?” Tony asked as Bruce stumbled into the lab.

Bruce squinted at the time on one of the computer monitors. “It’s barely past noon, Tony. Do we really have to do this now?”

Tony stood and walked over to his friend and laid a hand on his shoulder. “C'mon, Banner. It’s me.”

“Yeah, that’s the part that’s confusing me the most,” Bruce admitted with a grimace. “Since when did you becoming the deep-emotion guy? I thought that was Steve’s thing?”

Tony hemmed and hawed for a moment before finally confessing. “Pepper is concerned that I’m bottling up all of my emotions. Our therapist…”

“Your therapist?” Bruce interrupted. “Since when did you start seeing a therapist?”

“Right about the time Pepper found out he almost died on his little field trip to Titan,” YN interjected as she peeked out from behind her work station.

Bruce forced a smile onto his face and carefully nodded his aching head. “Hey, YN, didn’t see you there.” He turned back to Tony. “I think it’s great you’re talking to someone…”

“Yeah, I bet you are,” Tony teased with a wink.

“I told you—I’m not that kind of doctor,” Bruce reminded him.

“I know, I know.” Tony brushed aside his concerns. “The point I’m trying to make is that I’m worried about you. What you said last night…”

“If you had let me explain…"Bruce interrupted.

Tony continued speaking as though Bruce hadn’t said a word. ”…doesn’t make any sense, buddy. You were stuck as the Hulk for over two years.“

"Tell me about it,” Bruce lamented as he thought about the two years of his life that had been lost while the Hulk had been living it up as the Grandmaster’s pet.

Bruce shook his head and tried to focus his train of thought through the haze of the worst hangover he’d ever experienced. “Anyway, I think I’ve been going about this all wrong, Tony.”

“Let him speak,” YN warned Tony when she saw him gearing up to hit his soap box again.

Tony shut his mouth with a frustrated sigh and motioned for Bruce to explain his reasoning.

“We good?” Bruce asked. “You’re not going to keep interrupting me to tell me how stupid you think my idea is?”

“Tony’s going to behave,” YN assured Bruce as she gave Tony a hard look. “Aren’t you, Tony?”

“Who invited you again?” Tony asked YN with his usual sarcastic wit.

YN gave him a wink. “Don’t forget who helped you make it back to Earth.”

“Touché,” Tony admitted before turning back to Bruce. “By all means, please enlighten me as to the reason why you think the Hulk needs to come out and play more often.”

Bruce pursed his lips and tried to find the best way to put his thoughts into words. “You remember what happened at the Sanctum right after I got back. I was completely useless in the fight against Thanos because the Hulk wouldn’t appear when I called him.”

“Okay, so you’re saying he needs to be better trained?” Tony asked with a confused look.

“That’s the opposite of what I’m trying to say.” Bruce paused and ran a hand down his haggard face. “We’ve been treating the Hulk like some kind of toy—or weapon—I don’t know. The point is, Hulk has his own consciousness that even I wasn’t fully aware of. He’s not the most civilized being on the planet, but he’s got feelings just everyone else.”

“I think I see where you’re going with this,” Tony said as the pieces started falling into place. “You want the Hulk to feel like he has…uh, a what?…a life?”

Bruce shrugged his shoulders. “If that’s what it takes to make sure he’ll be available when we need him, then yeah.”

YN’s brow furrowed as she tried to understand what Bruce was saying. “So, you don’t think that the Hulk is an extension of your own psyche?”

“No, not exactly,” Bruce confirmed. “I think we’re linked, but he has his own personality separate from mine.”

“And you think we all need to get to know him—to be friends with him?” Tony asked as he arched one brow in question.

“Something like that. It’ll be good for you all to train with him so you’ll be better prepared for the next big bad that comes knocking on our door.”

“I think it’s a great idea,” YN said, earning her two shocked glances from the geniuses. “Not that my opinion matters at all.”

“Dammit, Banner,” Tony exclaimed as he grimaced and shook his head. “That’s twice this year that you’ve forced me to agree with the two biggest idiots in this Tower.”

“Hey now,” YN said, immediately taking offense. “I may not be a genius, but at least I’m not an airhead like Pietro.”

“I apologize, YN,” Tony said as he conceded YN’s point. “I keep forgetting we brought him back with the rest of the idiots that got zapped by the snap.”

“Ignore Tony,” Bruce told her with a smile. “I think you’ve done a fabulous job.”

“Well at least someone appreciates how much I do around here,” she mumbled under her breath as she turned back to her work.

“So, you’ll help me with the Hulk?”

Tony rolled his eyes. “If that’s what you really want to do, then I’ll help.”

Bruce’s face split into a wide grin. “It’s really good to have you back.”

“Science bros?” Tony asked as he held out his fist.

Bruce gave Tony a fist bump. “Science bros.”

_______________

Thank you for reading Day 2 of my writing challenge! I hope you enjoyed it! What did you think of Bruce’s explanation for his New Years resolution? I, for one, adored all of the Hulk’s scenes in Ragnarok and I’d love to see more of him and Thor together! I look forward to your comments!

If you liked this story, please consider reblogging, and if you have any questions, my inbox is always open! 

Day 3  (Tony Stark x Reader)

summary: I Miss You, You Dork (Peter Parker × OC)
body:
I Miss You, You Dork (Peter Parker × OC)

It had been a month and a half, a solid month, 4 days and 5 hours since my world went to hell. Since my best friend, my boyfriend, went missing. I had watched my mother turn to ash, along with my baby sister. I’m lost, I have no idea where Peter is, or if he still is alive.

My father placed his hand on my shoulder as I pulled out a picture of Peter and me at the zoo, he was eating a snow cone ,“Daddy, he’s not coming home, is he?” I looked to my father, who took the loss of my mom and Sherry hard.

“I dont know sweetie, the best thing I can tell you…is don’t linger in the past.” He sighed and kissed my forehead be fore leaving.

Knowing it was no good, I still felt the need to try one last time; I dialed his phone, getting the voicemail, “Peter Parker…I want you to come home, we still have prom, graduation…” I bit my lip, sniffling, “I understand your whole saving the world bit, and I love that you are selfless enough to do that. It’s just…I miss you, you dork. And if you can’t come home…I’ll never forget you, Pete.”

I hung up the phone, looking out the window, wanting despretly to see him swinging by, waving. But I have to come to terms with reality. I stand up from the window seat and shut the curtains, leaving the room and my phone on my seat.

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of all fic posted on the Archive Of Our Own under the Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov pairing tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed using an IFTTT recipe, but this was made easy thanks to astolat (astolat.tumblr.com). If you would like to set up a similar blog, see the instructions tab :) To check announcements regarding these blogs, go to the tumblr tag #ao3feed announcement. (moderated by enjolbutt.tumblr.com) I hope this blog helps when you are in dire need of feels or a laugh, so enjoy! :)

summary: I spent the last couple of hours of new year's day re watching Age Of Ultron. simply because it was on TV and noticed more...
body:
I spent the last couple of hours of new year’s day re watching Age Of Ultron. simply because it was on TV and noticed more details. When Tony and Bruce had the sceptre, they were not trying to download in it’s entirety the AI in the crystal, they were trying to grab parts of it they could use and apply it to their existing software. That is why Tony late in the film has a pile of drives for different named drives (including Jocasta) later in the movie. Anyway the existing AI realises Tony’s attempts to integrate it and reaches out itself to seize the lab’s systems obviously rightfully angry at the attempts to use it’s code. A constant theme in the MCU is that Tony is constantly scavenging and working with any alien tech he can get his hands on, that is why he set up Damage Control.

Also Quicksilver got shot a while before he was shot by Ultron which either means that he either had a tough constitution, some healing ability or because there was an infinity stone involved, the speed and the healing were linked to some sort of quantum alteration, which would also explain Wanda’s powers.

blog.name: im-trying-to-be-oky
blog.title: G.K.
blog.description: My Archive Stories! Pro. Depressionist/#1 irondad supporter/ #1 BTS Stan. ⎊

summary:
REALITY -HAWKEYE 
So it's pretty clear that Clint most likely witnessed his family biting the dust (sorry not sorry). So his...
body:
REALITY -HAWKEYE

So it’s pretty clear that Clint most likely witnessed his family biting the dust (sorry not sorry). So his reality is his lose. Hopefully we’ll see him going through with it in a proper and healthy way, but when does that happens.

SOUL -BLACK WIDOW

From what I’ve gathered in this fandom and movies is that natasha has “trouble” choosing a right identity. Shes either a friend, a double agent, the black widow, natalie. Shes always changing. But what about the REAL her. Her soul. Hopefully we get more of her real self in this movie. (Probably hoping for a lot. And most of it might not happen. But let me dream.)

MIND -CAPTAIN AMERICA.

In CW, we see cap act with his heart and soul more than his logical side. He can’t help it, hes and emotional guy. But in A4 he will need to put his feeling aside and focus. He’ll need to use his mind.

TIME -IRON MAN

Tony is running out of time. Hes dying from injuries, he doesn’t have food or water, HE DOESN’T HAVE OXYGEN. He’s losing time. I feel like in A4 we all will be sitting in the edge of our seats. Cause this movie with be a race against the clock. #givetonyoxygen2k19

SPACE -BRUCE/HULK

He is not getting enough space and time to collect his thought. Bruce basically went into a 3 year coma and woke up in space. Where hes never been before. His life has been changed since the Hulk. Constantly changing from location to location. One of my big theories I have in my brain is that. I think the HULK is fine he’s dosen’t like earth. He know once hes on earth bruce has more of a upper hand on “their” body. There not enough space for both of them.

Power -Thor

Thor is powerful,like so fucking powerful. And we’ve seen him display it multiple times. But the fact that all this power wasnt enough to save Loki, his people, Asgard and kill thanos it himself. Hopefully in A4 he learns to properly connect with his power and not be after of his limits.

The Russo brothers are fuxking smart.

So it’s pretty clear that Clint most likely witnessed his family biting the dust (sorry not sorry). So his reality is his lose. Hopefully we’ll see him going through with it in a proper and healthy way, but when does that happens.

SOUL -BLACK WIDOW

From what I’ve gathered in this fandom and movies is that natasha has “trouble” choosing a right identity. Shes either a friend, a double agent, the black widow, natalie. Shes always changing. But what about the REAL her. Her soul. Hopefully we get more of her real self in this movie. (Probably hoping for a lot. And most of it might not happen. But let me dream.)

MIND -CAPTAIN AMERICA.

In CW, we see cap act with his heart and soul more than his logical side. He can’t help it, hes and emotional guy. But in A4 he will need to put his feeling aside and focus. He’ll need to use his mind.

TIME -IRON MAN

Tony is running out of time. Hes dying from injuries, he doesn’t have food or water, HE DOESN’T HAVE OXYGEN. He’s losing time. I feel like in A4 we all will be sitting in the edge of our seats. Cause this movie with be a race against the clock. #givetonyoxygen2k19

SPACE -BRUCE/HULK

He is not getting enough space and time to collect his thought. Bruce basically went into a 3 year coma and woke up in space. Where hes never been before. His life has been changed since the Hulk. Constantly changing from location to location. One of my big theories I have in my brain is that. I think the HULK is fine he’s dosen’t like earth. He know once hes on earth bruce has more of a upper hand on “their” body. There not enough space for both of them.

Power -Thor

Thor is powerful,like so fucking powerful. And we’ve seen him display it multiple times. But the fact that all this power wasnt enough to save Loki, his people, Asgard and kill thanos it himself. Hopefully in A4 he learns to properly connect with his power and not be after of his limits.

The Russo brothers are fuxking smart.
trail.content:
REALITY -HAWKEYE

So it’s pretty clear that Clint most likely witnessed his family biting the dust (sorry not sorry). So his reality is his lose. Hopefully we’ll see him going through with it in a proper and healthy way, but when does that happens.

SOUL -BLACK WIDOW

From what I’ve gathered in this fandom and movies is that natasha has “trouble” choosing a right identity. Shes either a friend, a double agent, the black widow, natalie. Shes always changing. But what about the REAL her. Her soul. Hopefully we get more of her real self in this movie. (Probably hoping for a lot. And most of it might not happen. But let me dream.)

MIND -CAPTAIN AMERICA.

In CW, we see cap act with his heart and soul more than his logical side. He can’t help it, hes and emotional guy. But in A4 he will need to put his feeling aside and focus. He’ll need to use his mind.

TIME -IRON MAN

Tony is running out of time. Hes dying from injuries, he doesn’t have food or water, HE DOESN’T HAVE OXYGEN. He’s losing time. I feel like in A4 we all will be sitting in the edge of our seats. Cause this movie with be a race against the clock. #givetonyoxygen2k19

SPACE -BRUCE/HULK

He is not getting enough space and time to collect his thought. Bruce basically went into a 3 year coma and woke up in space. Where hes never been before. His life has been changed since the Hulk. Constantly changing from location to location. One of my big theories I have in my brain is that. I think the HULK is fine he’s dosen’t like earth. He know once hes on earth bruce has more of a upper hand on “their” body. There not enough space for both of them.

Power -Thor

Thor is powerful,like so fucking powerful. And we’ve seen him display it multiple times. But the fact that all this power wasnt enough to save Loki, his people, Asgard and kill thanos it himself. Hopefully in A4 he learns to properly connect with his power and not be after of his limits.

blog.name: ao3feed-clintxnat
blog.title: love is for children, i owe him a debt.
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of all fic posted on the Archive Of Our Own under the Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov pairing tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed using an IFTTT recipe, but this was made easy thanks to astolat (astolat.tumblr.com). If you would like to set up a similar blog, see the instructions tab :) To check announcements regarding these blogs, go to the tumblr tag #ao3feed announcement. (moderated by enjolbutt.tumblr.com) I hope this blog helps when you are in dire need of feels or a laugh, so enjoy! :)

title: Powerlines
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2GQjJB5

by sleepytardis

Steve Rogers is the new kid in town. And, with Phil Coulson as his acting Uncle, he must learn how to get along with the other kids in school… despite the fact that he’s surrounded by a sharpshooter archer, a trained Russian badass, a physics nerd, a chemistry nerd, and a Norse god. It seems like the chaos that Steve endured to become the world’s only super-soldier is infectious as things go from normal to crazy to insane in the span of a few months.

Words: 1150, Chapters: 2/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
